conditions.label: The ticket is exchangeable and refundable for free until departure. After that, call us to exchange it up to 1 hour after departure, up to 2 hours after departure you can exhange it from the departure station.
Non-exchangeable and non-refundable after departure.

Exchangeable without charge until the departure time indicated on the ticket. The potential price difference between the old and new ticket applies. Refundable at 100% in the event of a cancellation before the departure time indicated on the ticket. Refundable at 50% after departure, within a maximum term of 2 months.

Services included : Meals served at your seat, International Newspapers and magazines, Access to the Lounge, Taxi booking (service proposed in Paris and Brussels), More spacious seats, Electrical socket, WIFI +. Included per ticket 1 hand luggage and 2 pieces of luggage with maximum dimensions of 75*53*30cm.
